page.title: 17TOURISM IN THE RIBBLE VALLEY
page.content: TOURISM in the area is now a very important economic factor.Ribble Vall- ey has been for many years an attracti- ve place to visit-it is an area of out- standing Natural Beauty.The policy of the Borough Council is to develop and publicise the attraction of the area. The Council has set up a Tourist Infor- mation Centre in the foyer of its offi- ces where information on hotels,farm- houses,shops,walks,museums,parking places and places of interest can be obtained.Guides,maps and free litera- ture is also provided by the N.W.Tour- ist Board.The acceptance by the general public that there is nothing wrong or immoral with people having leisure time has led to the improvement in many hotels,inns and farm accommodation.In Ch'burn and Wadd'ton 30-40 people are emloyed in service industries due to the influx of tourists.
